snippet.title: For Evelyn - Story Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist For Evelyn on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1292860/For_Evelyn/

For Evelyn is a Story-driven RPG Adventure, that tells the story of two lovers, which will send the world into a state of chaos and war.

Features:

- Intriguing tale of love, betrayal, and the ultimate sacrifice.
- Well written narrative
- Powerful musical score
- Point & Click interaction
- Excellent pixel art graphics
- Unique character portraits
- Varied maps to explore
- Leveling system
- Voice acting
- Crafting

Song composed by Eero Lehikoinen
Title screen artwork by Yorugami https://twitter.com/ArtofYorugami

Voice Actors:
Evelyn - Amanda Hufford @JustTheClippy
Yohanna - Melissa Medina @melissamedinavo
Eragon - Joe Cliff Thompson @JCliffThompson
Edwin - Steven Kelly @Sarifus
Lord Maxwell - PJ Kanis @PeeJVA
Narrator - Maisy Kay @maisykay

~ Important Links ~
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Kisuarts 
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/kisuarts 
Link Tree: https://linktr.ee/Kisuarts 

Play Arcanbreak now! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1402400/Arcanbreak/
